medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe dizziness, weakness, chest pressure, and dyspnea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began while working in the yard; severe dizziness, weakness, chest pressure, and dyspnea were noted. Symptoms were relieved with rest. Later that evening, he experienced substernal chest pain radiating to his back, lasting four hours and resolved spontaneously.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Glaucoma, Hyperlipidemia, Hypertension, Orbital Fracture from baseball injury.
medical_history.family_history: Father - myocardial infarction at age unspecified; Grandfather - myocardial infarction at age unspecified.
